body: I’m waiting in line for EPIX Panel. My body is ready. I am ready. My stomach on the other hand is filled with butterflies!!!!!! I’m literally going to burst of excitement!!!! I’m here. Bitch. I made it!!!! I am H3RE! Sadly, I didn’t bring my laptops so no gifsets this weekend. 😭😭😭😭 I cant win them all. Happy Star Wars Celebration! MAY THE FORCE BE WITH US ALL!

summary: Disney: Star Wars to “take a break” after Episode IX
title: Disney: Star Wars to “take a break” after Episode IX
body:
It turns out Star Wars fatigue - or the fear of fatigue - is a thing.


CEO Bob Iger tells Bloomberg that there actually are films in development at the moment, but any announcements or releases are going to have to wait a while.


“We will take a pause, some time, and reset, because the Skywalker saga comes to an end with this ninth movie,” Iger says. “There will be a bit of a hiatus.”


Disney still has three Star Wars series planned for Disney+, which launches in November for $7 a month. Star Wars Episode IX is set to hit theaters in December.
body_abstract: It turns out Star Wars fatigue - or the fear of fatigue - is a thing.

summary: Reylo fam, send me stuff from Celebration!
body:
Reylo fam, send me stuff from Celebration!

I’m traveling in airports and then driving through nowhere all day today. Please send me spoilers, rumors, whatever we get our grubby paws on. I’ll be forever grateful.

summary: Finalmente la Star Wars Celebration è cominciata, e come sapete in questi giorni vedremo non poche novità riguardo i nuovi...
body:
Finalmente la Star Wars Celebration è cominciata, e come sapete in questi giorni vedremo non poche novità riguardo i nuovi progetti a tema Star Wars, sia di quelli che verranno distribuiti al cinema (come Star Wars: Episodi IX e gli altri film), sia i progetti televisivi o per gli SVOD, di cui ieri vi abbiamo parlato ampiamente in questo articolo.

Mentre aspettiamo che dettagli, trailer, clip o quant’altro arrivi da questa celebrazione, possiamo mostrarvi il bellissimo murales realizzato da Jason Palmer che racchiude in se l’intera saga degli Skywalker pubblicata fino ad ora.

Fino a qualche giorno fa mancava la parte dedicata a Star Wars: Episodio IX, che però è stata aggiunta stamattina, quindi ve la mostriamo di seguito.

Qui sotto potete vedere alcune sezioni del murale in formato più piccolo cosi che possiate godere dei dettagli:






Ed a seguite potete vedere le versioni in formato banner integrali:

Star Wars Celebration: ecco il banner ufficiale della saga degli Skywalker Finalmente la Star Wars Celebration è cominciata, e come sapete in questi giorni vedremo non poche novità riguardo i nuovi progetti a tema Star Wars, sia di quelli che verranno distribuiti al cinema (come Star Wars: Episodi IX e gli altri film), sia i progetti televisivi o per gli SVOD, di cui ieri vi abbiamo parlato ampiamente in questo articolo.

summary: Without the slightest hesitation, the cloaked figure of Kylo Ren emerged and strode forward to join the battle. A stunned Rey...

blog.title: I saw endgame and everything hurts :)
blog.description: Kaitlin✨| Multifandom with Star Wars at its heart | Currently blogging a lot about: Marvel (clintasha specifically) :) | Yell about stuff with me in my askbox!| gif header by @longwayfrombudapest | Positivity is key! | slowly becoming a ‘this is my newest and latest interest that I’ll blog about for a while’ blog so there’s that heads up | forever a reysky enthusiast | “Stay afraid, but do it anyway. What’s important is the action. You don’t have to wait to be confident. Just do it and eventually the confidence will follow.” -Carrie Fisher

summary: Pretty minor thing, but I want a Poe vs Hux fight.  Both Rey and Finn have fought their rival in the villain trio (Kylo and...
question: Pretty minor thing, but I want a Poe vs Hux fight.  Both Rey and Finn have fought their rival in the villain trio (Kylo and Phasma respectively) one-on-one, and it would be cool to see Hux feel the need to dirty his own hands ("if you want something done right" thing).  Just give me five straight minutes of Oscar and Domhnall wailing on each other.
answer: Anon I didn’t know I wanted this until now oh my god. That would be so cool!! Especially since it would give us more Poe time and I love Poe so much 😭🙌🏻

reblog.comment: Anon I didn’t know I wanted this until now oh my god. That would be so cool!! Especially since it would give us more Poe time and I love Poe so much 😭🙌🏻
